item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - Bulk actions
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - Bulk actions Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1062 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Order Settings > Go to Statuses tab * Page title contains “Statuses” * All Statuses shouldn’t have checkbox and a down arrow on the right of the edit button Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Order Settings > Go to Statuses tab Page title contains “Statuses” Click on the “Add new order status” Add new Order status page is displayed Fill all fields > Save Message Successful creation is displayed
